column2: Nokia shares fall on patent dispute with Apple HELSINKI/BELGRADE Nokia  shares fell by nearly 5 percent on Thursday in Helsinki as analysts warned a legal battle with Apple  could delay for years royalty payments that are vital to shoring up the Finnish company's profits. ~Nokia sues Apple for infringing patents

column4: striking back at the iPhone maker's legal action targeting the one-time cellphone industry leader a day earlier. |Â Video  ~
